component.name: SELinux Troubleshooter
component.summary: Troubleshoot SELinux policy and access denials

description.p: The SELinux Troubleshooter provides a graphical user interface to help diagnose SELinux policy issues. When Access Vector Cache (AVC) denial messages are logged by SELinux, the SELinux Troubleshooter generates a desktop notification containing information about the problem and allows the user to launch the troubleshooting interface to help track down the cause of the denial.
